document.masterDocTitle: On the species of the genus Anthaxia Eschscholtz, 1829 described by A. Théry from Angola in 1947 (Coleoptera: Buprestidae: Anthaxiini)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: On the species of the genus Anthaxia Eschscholtz, 1829 described by A. Théry from Angola in 1947 (Coleoptera: Buprestidae: Anthaxiini)

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 9–11.
Anthaxia ( Haplanthaxia ) decimata Théry, 1947
. 9—
A . ( H .) decimata
, holotype, 6.0 mm; 10—the same, original labelling; 11—
A . ( H .) egena Kerremans, 1913
, syntype, 6.2 mm.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Having studied the holotype of
Anthaxia decimata
and the syntype of
A. egena
I failed to find any substantial differences and I propose that
A . decimata
Théry, 1947
to be conspecific with
A . egena
Kerremans, 1913
and a junior synonym.

According to the illustration in the description (
Théry, 1947
) in this case I also erroneously treated this species in the subgenus
Cratomerus (
Bílý, 1997
)
.
